thread.title: U.S. Government Bond Yields Fall
thread.title_full: U.S. Government Bond Yields Fall - WSJ

author: Min Zeng
title: U.S. Government Bond Yields Fall
text:
U.S. Treasury bonds strengthened on Friday for a second consecutive session as rising volatility in riskier markets and a contained U.S. inflation indicator boost the appeal of haven assets.
Crude oil prices fell after rising above $43 a barrel earlier Friday following Thursdayâ€™s biggest one-day surge since 2009. European and U.S. stocks pulled back after a rally. Lower energy prices reduce concern about inflation, which chips away at... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
